text: Curd mint lassi Put the curd into the blender.  Add some mint leaves (pudinah).  Blend the two ingredients together. Blend until well combined. Add 1/2 teaspoon of salt (or sugar).  Mix well. Pour into a glass. Serve. It can be consumed with any type of pickle as a side dish. Yogurt mint lassi Toast the cumin seeds. Place in a dry heavy skillet. Heat over medium heat. Toss or shake often to prevent burning. After 1 to 2 minutes, remove from the heat. Place the yogurt, mint, salt and water into the blender. Add 1 1/2 teaspoons of the toasted cumin seeds. Blend the ingredients together. When it turns a pale green color, it's ready to serve. Pour into a serving glass. Add ice to the glass first. Garnish with the remaining toasted cumin seeds. Serve immediately.
